lead_paragraph: The financing giant will be getting a fuller credit picture of borrowers, including whether they pay off credit card bills in full or just the minimum.

headline.print_headline: Fannie Mae Lenders Drill Deeper Into the Details About Potential Borrowers
headline.main: Fannie Mae Is Now Getting More Detailed Information on Borrowers

snippet: The financing giant will be getting a fuller credit picture of borrowers, including whether they pay off credit card bills in full or just the minimum....
